characters: Multiple pedestrians, including a child and an adult, and a cyclist. The child is wearing a blue jacket and is seen running across the road. The adult is wearing a dark jacket and is also crossing the road. The cyclist is riding on the right side of the road.
summary: The video sequence shows a series of dangerous situations involving pedestrians and cyclists. In the first sequence, a child suddenly runs across the road from the right side, emerging from behind a parked vehicle, creating an immediate collision risk. In the second sequence, an adult pedestrian crosses the road from the right side, also emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a cyclist is seen riding on the right side of the road, and a pedestrian suddenly crosses the road from the right side, emerging from behind a wall.
actions: The child runs across the road from the right side, the adult pedestrian crosses the road from the right side, and the cyclist is riding on the right side of the road. The pedestrian in the third sequence also crosses the road from the right side.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on the right side of the road, a wall on the right side of the road, and a cyclist on the right side of the road.
